text: Ding Liren (born 1992) is a Chinese chess grandmaster. He won the Chinese Chess Championship in 2009.Casa do Xadrez On 6 June 2009, at the age of 16, he became the youngest ever person to win the national title. In October 2009. In April 2011, Ding won the Chinese Championship for a second time. He was the World Champion from 2023-2024, being defeated by Gukesh Dommaraju. ==References== Category:Chinese chess players Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters
title: Ding Liren
